description:
Dive into stunning anime art and solve puzzles to enjoy images of lovely girls posing exclusively for you! As the difficulty level increases, the images become more piquant. Take your time, enjoy the process and collect all the puzzles.

Features:
• 50 puzzles with images of lovely girls in seductive outfits
• Simple and addictive game mechanics
• Increasing puzzle difficulty
• Relaxing and atmospheric music
name: Hentai Paradise Vol. 1
